backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profiles, question management (with subjects and class levels), full syllabus mock tests with sections, test attempts with scoring and leaderboard, admin registration with access control, and includes MixinStorage and MixinAuthorization for blob storage and authorization.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that renames the 'admins' field to 'adminPrincipals' in the actor state while preserving questions, fullSyllabusTests, and sectionStatuses data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the AdminRegistration.tsx component update to refetch user role query, display success message, and auto-navigate to admin dashboard after first admin registration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, components (Navbar with dual admin verification, Layout, Footer), pages (dashboards, test interface, results, leaderboard), hooks for queries and mutations, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives and OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for the Concept Delta navy blue theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, title, and description for the Concept Delta MHT-CET mock test platform.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring React Query client, TanStack Router, theme provider, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Concept Delta branding, quick links, YouTube channel link, social media handle, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper component that renders Navbar, main content outlet, and Footer for consistent page structure.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar with Concept Delta branding, authentication via Internet Identity, dual admin verification using useGetCallerUserRole and useIsCallerAdmin hooks with comprehensive diagnostic logging, responsive mobile menu, and conditional Admin Setup link visibility for non-admin authenticated users.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and initializing access control with an admin token from URL parameters.
Provides a mutation hook for registering admin users with retry logic, exponential backoff, and comprehensive error handling for actor availability and principal validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChapterWiseTestMut: Exports mutation hooks for creating chapter-wise tests and assigning questions to them, invalidating relevant queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullSyllabusTestMu: Provides mutation hooks for creating full syllabus tests and assigning section-specific questions to them, with query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines query hooks for fetching full syllabus tests, chapter-wise tests, questions, user profiles, and user roles with actor availability checks and enhanced logging.
Provides a mutation hook for creating questions with pre-flight admin verification, detailed error logging, and toast notifications for success/failure states.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestSectionMutatio: Defines placeholder mutation hooks for starting and submitting test sections, currently throwing not-implemented errors as backend functionality is pending.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including colors for UI components (buttons, cards, sidebars, charts) and responsive hero image styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminChapterWiseTestC: Admin page for creating chapter-wise tests with question selection, configurable marks per question, duration settings, and role-based access control that redirects non-admin users.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabbed interface showing analytics, test management (full syllabus and chapter-wise tests), question gallery, and user management with role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/AdminFullSyllabusTest: Admin page for creating full syllabus tests with two sections (Physics/Chemistry and Maths), allowing question selection for each section with validation and role-based access.
frontend/src/pages/AdminQuestionCreate.t: Admin form for creating questions with text/image support, four options with text/image, correct answer selection, explanation, subject and class level categorization, with role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRegistration.tsx: Admin registration page accessible via direct URL that allows existing admins to register new admins by principal ID, with validation, status checking, and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page component that displays hero banner, features, YouTube subscription prompt, and Telegram community section with call-to-action to login or navigate to dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Leaderboard page placeholder that shows a 'coming soon' message with authentication guard, explaining that backend implementation is needed for test scoring and rankings.
frontend/src/pages/ResultPage.tsx: Results page placeholder that displays a 'coming soon' message with authentication guard, indicating backend implementation is required for test results and analysis features.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Student dashboard that displays available full syllabus and chapter-wise tests with authentication guard; shows placeholder alerts indicating test-taking functionality is under development.
frontend/src/pages/TestInterface.tsx: Test interface page placeholder that shows a 'coming soon' message with authentication guard, explaining that backend implementation is needed for test attempts and answer submission.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application's routing structure using TanStack Router, mapping paths to components for landing, dashboards, admin pages, test interface, results, and leaderboard.
frontend/src/utils/pdfExport.ts: Disabled PDF export utility with placeholder types and stub function that alerts users the feature is unavailable until backend test attempt functionality is implemented.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and functions to clear sensitive parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space (including sidebar, chart, and semantic colors), container settings, border radius variables, custom animations (accordion), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document for 'Concept Delta' MHT-CET mock test platform describing architecture (Motoko backend, React frontend, Internet Identity auth), test types (full syllabus and chapter-wise), known admin authorization/bootstrapping issues, and feature change history including rebranding from 'COEPian Delta'.
